message.content:
{"id": "4971", "title": "Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'", "description": "Bug 4971: When performing a 'copy package' operation in the Eclipse IDE, the behavior is unexpected. Steps to reproduce: 1. Create a new project and name it xxx. 2. In the package viewer, select a package in project A. 3. From the context menu, choose copy. 4. "}

{"OB": "After selecting 'copy' from the context menu, the package should be successfully copied to the clipboard.", "EB": "After selecting 'copy' from the context menu, the package is not copied to the clipboard.", "SR": "Investigate the issue and fix the 'copy package' functionality in the Eclipse IDE to ensure that the package is successfully copied to the clipboard."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
